definition: one who tries never to offend anybody

prefix used before the surname of a person or a numeral indicating the order of birth of the children in a family or to indicate affection or familiarity/old (of people)/venerable (person)/experienced/of long standing/always/all the time/of the past/very/outdated/(of meat etc) tough
to be fond of/to have a tendency to/to be prone to
good/well/proper/good to/easy to/very/so/(suffix indicating completion or readiness)/(of two people) close/on intimate terms/(after a personal pronoun) hello
man/person/people/CL:個|个[ge4],位[wei4]

sentences.english: Merely continue being the good guy that you probably are.
sentences.chinese: 继续装糊涂，做个老好人吧。

sentences.english: I consider he is a Very abundance nice guy, which rewhichley only tries to hunter people.
sentences.chinese: 他是个老好人，总是尽力帮助更多有请致电。

sentences.english: The liberal candidate was accused by his conservation opponent of being a bleeding heart on welfare issues.
sentences.chinese: 自由派候选人在福利问题上被保守派对手斥为老好人。

sentences.english: Steve is such a nice guy that he's always taking the rap for his colleagues.
sentences.chinese: 斯蒂夫是个老好人，他总替同事承担责任。

sentences.english: Michael is such a kind man that everyone in the team likes him.
sentences.chinese: 迈克尔是个老好人，组里每个人都很喜欢他。

sentences.english: John is a clilnking good fellow.
It's easy to be the nice guy.

definition: sb who tries to be on good terms with everyone
sb who tries to be on good terms with everyone
Mr Goody-goody/yes-man (sb who agrees with anything)
peacemaker/mediator/(derog.) fixer
(fig.) punching bag
warmhearted/willing to help others
to try to smooth things over/to paper over the issues/to gloss things over
frank and outspoken (idiom)/straight speaking/to say what one thinks
amiable/easy-going
two-faced person/double-dealing
outside appearance and inner reality differ (idiom); not what it seems/saying one thing but meaning sth different
everything for self and selfish profit (idiom); with no regard for others/selfish/mercenary
be smooth and slick (in establishing social relations)
narrow/petty-minded
an awkward person/a difficult person to deal with
selfless/impartial
